descriptions:
['DescriptionAchiever Properties is pleased to offer you this stunning community plot for sale in Pearl Jumeirah. 
The plot is very strategically located and an ideal size. Very close to the community and the Nikki Beach Hotel and Residences. 
This land is a freehold property and allows to build basement plus ground & first floor.
Pearl Jumeirah is an Island very strategically located between old and new Dubai. Living the high-end lifestyle of Jumeirah yet being close to old Dubai and Downtown.
The island also has the world famous Nikki Beach Hotel and Residences where the residents can access the beach and have all the facilities.
The island has 2 beaches where the residents can enjoy the open sea views or enjoy the splendid skyline of Dubai facing the Sheikh Zayed Road and Burj Khalifa.
There master developer for Pearl Jumeirah is Meeras and the community is maintained by Dubai Municipality.
We have more plots available on the island.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionSam McCone from McCone Properties is pleased to offer this luxury three-bedroom in The Address Fountain Views
The photos are of the actual apartment and were taken on 13/01/2020
The apartment comes fully furnished and is ready for immediate occupancy. You can see the quality of the furniture and appliances in the photos. The apartment is on a very high floor and offers full views of The Burj Khalifa, Dubai Fountains and Opera House. Every bedroom has wooden flooring and en-suite bathrooms. There are many more details but I think a viewing is essential to truly appreciate it.
Fountain Views is located close to Burj Khalifa, The Dubai Fountains, the Metro Station, Souk Al Bahar, loads of restaurants, Fashion Avenue Dubai Mall with its own direct access, The Dubai Opera, The Coca Cola Arena, plus you are located on the elegantly lit Boulevard. 
To know more about this unit and arrange a viewing:
